MAIN_MESSAGE: Today's planned interruption to the electrical supply in the TD12 postcode area of Cornhill on Tweed has been cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances. If this work is re-arranged, we will contact you to confirm the date and time. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.58am on Thursday 21st January 2021
